name: Monster in the Dark (itch)
description:
You are an adventurer looking for ancient treasure and secrets. Delve into dark temples and mazes, navigating them with your torch and map! But beware, a terrible Monster is after you, and you only have one bullet in your trusty revolver. Will you find it, or will it find you?

Use the dungeon walls to locate your position on the map, while trying to hear the steps of the monster to locate it at the same time. You have to make that one bullet count, or it will be your end!
